Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 85th overall pick, by San Diego in 2007...
Injured on 4/24/2007 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from San Diego to Houston on 4/15/2011 (Going to SDN: LF J. Bay, P A. Pena. Going to HOU: P J. McLovin, P B. Haris, P C. House, CF C. Maybin, CF M. Taylor)...
Injured on 4/15/2012 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Houston to Detroit on 4/23/2012 (Going to HOU: LF A. Kearns, P J. Colome. Going to DET: P B. Haris, P R. Gonzalez, LF D. Young)...
Injured on 7/5/2013 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/24/2014...
Had first career hit on 7/18/2015, off Trevor Bauer (ARI)...
Struck out 15 batters against New York (A) on 10/1/2015...
Injured on 6/25/2016 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 9-10 weeks...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Traded from Detroit to Chicago (N) on 7/31/2019 (Going to CHN: P B. Haris. Going to DET: P H. Casey Jr., P B. Cantwell Jr.)...
Injured on 5/11/2020 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Injured on 6/14/2023 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
